Juliet? Oh, Juliet, where are you?
Mercury and Benny look down at the entrance to the cataco amid a crowd of angry dogs. A second later the angry cats storm in the front door. Mercury and Benny look at one another confused.

Just as Rover has reached the point of total frustration, turns a corner and sees a newly decorated tomb with the w “Juliet Cat-Pulet” written above it. MEANWHILE UPSTAIRS ... The cats have gathered for a pep-talk.  76.
Guys! The cats stand in line, shoulder to shoulder. Tyger addresses them like an all-star wrestler. He is so angry veins bulge out of his neck.
We’re gonna crush him! Then we’re gonna mush him! And then we’re gonna flush him! A confused cat turns to another cat.
Who?
The pooch you moron!
The pooch!
The pooch!
My kingdom for that pooch!! Shake turns to Speare.
He’s kind of getting the hang of this ...
Charge! The cats scatter throughout the catacombs in a mad frenzy
The Doves finally get Flyer to the front door, setting hi gently on the front step.
So she’s in here? The Doves nod pensively. Flyer opens the front door and looks in to the spooky catacombs.

Oooh. Dark. Spooky. Reminds me of home. (To the Doves) Care to join me? The Doves shake their heads and high-tail it.  77. INT. JULIET’S TOMB Rover solemnly approaches the tomb and finds Juliet laid on a golden pedestal. She looks lovely. Big tears come to Rover’s eyes.

Oh Juliet. Look at you. There isn’t anything I wouldn’t give just to hear you purr once again. He kisses Juliet lightly on the cheek. Suddenly, Juliet begins to purr ever so softly. Rover looks at her complet shocked.
Juliet? Is that you? Why ... why you’re purring! Your whiskers are moving! Juliet opens her eyes.
Juliet, you are alive!
Of course I am alive. They hug each other ecstatically! Then Rover looks at her again, unable to believe that his dream has come true.
But ... but ... I don’t understand ... A wave of recognition spreads across Rover's face.
Maybe it’s true what they say about cats.
What?
That you have nine lives.
I only have one life, Rover. But I want to spend that life with you.
Then how did you ...
I couldn’t do it. I just couldn’t drink all of that ... At that very moment, Tyger’s platoon turns the corner and sees Rover. Juliet, still back in her tomb, is not visibl to the charging cats.  78.
There he is! As the cats near, Rover turns to Juliet.
Come on! Juliet tries to get up but stumbles. Obviously, the potio has not completely worn off yet.

I can’t yet. Run! Rover looks at her longingly again. JULIET (cont'd) Rover, GO! Rover finally turns and sprints further down the passagew The cats are right behind him. Juliet tries to get their attention ... JULIET (cont'd) Tyger, guys! Stop... ... but Tyger is too focused on the chase, and Juliet is weak. The pursuit leaves her behind.

head_text.subj: IN ANOTHER PART OF THE CATACOMBS

text: Flyer is soliciting help from some of his brethren who ha upside down in a passageway.
Hey Lenny. How’s it hanging?
Not so bad.
You know where Juliet’s tomb is? Lenny gestures with his eyes.
Thataway.
Thanks! MEANWHILE ... Rover is losing ground. The snarling pack of cats nip at heals as he ducks down yet another tunnel.  79.
Flyer comes across Juliet who is now able to walk.
Juliet!
Oh, Flyer, you gotta help me.
What?
They're trying to kill Rover!
Who?
My family! They went down there!
Come on.

head_text.subj: AT THE END OF THE TUNNEL

text: Rover comes to a dead end. He’s trapped! The cats corner him against the wall. Tyger comes to the front of the pac
Well done, henchcats! Tyger practices elongating his nails as he did into the d board before.
Now we're going to have a little fun! Rover looks at Tyger’s nails and is terrified.

head_text.subj: JUST DOWN THE TUNNEL A LITTLE LATER

text: Juliet and Flyer have found Rover and the pack. They hudd in the shadows and come up with a plan.
You got it?
I think so.
You're not going to get scared?
I’ll try.  80.

All right then. Let’s go. At the end of the tunnel, the cats have Rover’s four limb pinned to the wall. A bulls-eye has been drawn on Rover's chest. Tyger stands behind a line drawn in the dirt and prepares to throw ... All of a sudden we hear a terrifyin screech! All the cats turn and see Flyer, who has converted himsel into a HORRIFYING VAMPIRE BAT! He bares his fangs and div in on the cats. They scatter in a flash. FLYER (cont'd) I vant to suck your blood! Tyger is the only cat who can keep his cool.
